Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Reroute at Laramie/Ohio
ShortDescription: 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Chicago, Washington and Laramie: due to, street blockage near Laramie/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Chicago, Washington and Laramie: due to, street blockage near Laramie/Ohio.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Fullerton.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
